item.title: 在总统竞选活动中，人们可能会把年老作为一种负担来讨论，但在今年的奥斯卡颁奖典礼上却并非如此。马丁-斯科塞斯（Martin Scorsese）、宫崎骏（Hayao Miyazaki）和维姆-文德斯（Wim Wenders）等人的提名表明，我们可能正生活在老年电影人的黄金时代。
item.description:
Old age may be debated as a liability on the presidential campaign trail, but it's not at this year’s Oscars. Nominees like Martin Scorsese, Hayao Miyazaki and Wim Wenders suggest we may be living in the golden age of the aged filmmaker. pic.twitter.com/r3YuLMy1xe

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 1, 2024

item.title: 棒球明星大谷翔平（Shohei Ohtani）惊爆已婚。当天晚些时候，大谷翔平在驼背牧场接受了媒体采访，他说他的新妻子是一位 "日本女性"，但没有透露她的身份。
item.description:
Baseball star Shohei Ohtani has stunningly revealed he's married. He spoke to the media about it later in the day at Camelback Ranch, saying his new wife was a “Japanese woman” without identifying her. https://t.co/9yTqgvyJwJ pic.twitter.com/F0864wD9DN

— AP Sports (@AP_Sports) February 29, 2024
